txt.en: Collect materials to build a gate to seal off the upper level of Tírith Rhaw. All the materials needed can be found in the wilds of the Ettenmoors.

'We have captured Tírith Rhaw. Let us not rest here. Let us build a defence at the entry to the tower's heart so we might stop the enemy advance. For this, I will need items gathered from here in the Ettenmoors. Should you collect these and return them to me, I will see the gate is built.'
'This is enough to craft a sturdy door. We will set about building the door as quickly as we can.\n\n'Thank you for your assistance.'
Return to Malhathel at Tírith Rhaw
Now that you have control of the tower of Tírith Rhaw, you must build a door to defend the upper level of the tower.
'Make haste. We should do all we can to defend the tower and hold this position.'
